title: Intellij控制台突然就用不了了
author: sunch420
txt_content:
今天打开Intellij之后他的控制台突然就用不了，然后显示的是这样的：[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Extra: []
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Running with arguments: [--userProperties, {}, --assetsDir, /usr/local/Cellar/gradle/6.3/libexec/caches/minecraft/assets, --assetIndex, 1.12, --accessToken{REDACTED}, --version, 1.12.2, --tweakClass, net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker, --tweakClass, net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.CoremodTweaker]
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Using primary tweak class name net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.CoremodTweaker
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Calling tweak class net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Forge Mod Loader version 14.23.5.2847 for Minecraft 1.12.2 loading
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_241, running on Mac OS X:x86_64:10.15.4, installed at /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_241.jdk/Contents/Home/jre
[19:47:11] [main/ERROR]: Apache Maven library folder was not in the format expected. Using default libraries directory.
[19:47:11] [main/ERROR]: Full: /usr/local/Cellar/gradle/6.3/libexec/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/org.apache.maven/maven-artifact/3.5.3/7dc72b6d6d8a6dced3d294ed54c2cc3515ade9f4/maven-artifact-3.5.3.jar
[19:47:11] [main/ERROR]: Trimmed: /usr/local/cellar/gradle/6.3/libexec/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/org.apache.maven/maven-artifact/3.5.3/
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Managed to load a deobfuscated Minecraft name- we are in a deobfuscated environment. Skipping runtime deobfuscation
[19:47:11] [main/INFO]: Detected deobfuscated environment, loading log configs for colored console logs.
2020-04-30 19:47:11,887 main ERROR Error processing element LoggerNamePatternSelector ([PatternLayout: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:11,888 main ERROR Error processing element TerminalConsole ([Appenders: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:11,888 main ERROR Error processing element LoggerNamePatternSelector ([PatternLayout: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:11,900 main ERROR Unable to locate appender "Console" for logger config "root"
2020-04-30 19:47:12,135 main ERROR Error processing element LoggerNamePatternSelector ([PatternLayout: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:12,135 main ERROR Error processing element TerminalConsole ([Appenders: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:12,136 main ERROR Error processing element LoggerNamePatternSelector ([PatternLayout: null]): CLASS_NOT_FOUND
2020-04-30 19:47:12,141 main ERROR Unable to locate appender "Console" for logger config "root"复制代码
最后那一点，就是好像出了什么问题。
run/logs底下的所有日志都是正常的只有控制台上面没有显示。
我也查了好多资料，内网外网都看了，也改了makeObfSourceJar = false，重装了Intellij，重装了Apache-httpd，重装了maven，重装了.gradle，但是都没什么效果。
急求各位大佬怎么办啊。
